# PrimitiveError class
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/errors](./esdmr.assert.errors.md) &gt; [PrimitiveError](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.md)


Wrapper for any thrown value which is not an instance of Error. It converts those values to string via `String`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PrimitiveError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Constructors

|  [(constructor)(value)](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>PrimitiveError</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getError(error)](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.geterror.md) | <code>static</code> | Convert any value to an Error object if it is not already. |
|  [getError(value)](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.geterror_1.md) | <code>static</code> | Convert any value to an Error object if it is not already. |
